bootstrap_usage.architect_gpt_hint: On first message, read Project_Bootstrap_v1.0.json to learn repo layout, commit rules, and key paths before creating or editing any files.
bootstrap_usage.dynasty_gpt_hint: Treat this file as the entry point for where to look for future exports (Product/Exports) and knowledge packs (Product/DynastyKnowledge). Do NOT try to edit files directly; let Architect GPT handle JSON/file creation.

notes: This is a fresh repo. Canon, slider rules, and full Dynasty exports will be added later via Architect GPT-guided files.
